thread.section_title: Trustpilot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trustpilot | www.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Sanet

author: Sanet
title: Sanet
text: I think this is a great site and wish I had known about it before I made my booking. My only problem is that I received a (not helpful) response and wanted to reply on that after receiving more information. I was not sure how to do that and posted new reviews. Unfortunately they just say "The user posted more than one post to complaint about the same reservation". And that's it! So, there is no way to solve a problem. At least I hope other passengers will read the reviews before they make bookings.
